## Language / File Type

What language or file type should MEDUSA scan?

## Existing Tools

Are there existing linters/scanners for this? (e.g., tool names, links)

## Example Files

If possible, provide example files that should be scanned.

## Security Concerns

What security issues are common in this language?

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information.
